title: Painting Your Way Out of a Corner - Happy B day Ruby
description:
Painting Your Way Out of a Corner: The Art of Getting Unstuck by Barbara Diane Barry

Overview: In the tradition of The ArtistÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Way, an exciting program that introduces painting as a jumping-off point for realizing oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s full creative potential in all areas of life.

Based on author Barbara Diane BarryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s popular course Art for Self-Discovery and supported by research in psychology and the science of brain function, Painting Your Way Out of a Corner guides readers through the process of overcoming blocks and expressing themselves freely in painting.
